title: I think someone has acsess to my account
body: So prior to this i had someone get onto my account and buy them selves gifts then i change my password twice, log on today and there is two mastery pages i didnt use my flash is on f when i always have it on d and my rune page is set to another one then my main, sure that could of been me by mistake but then i go to check, i logged off for the night after a game a pantheon sure enough there is another ranked game 2 hours after it that was a victor game (of course it was a loss so i lose lp) and im concerned so could i get some help with this because it seems changing my password dosent help.

replies.body:
Hey Topzombie22, 

Have you looked through the account protection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account

If you want to see if there is something going on within your account you can always tweet out to @Riotsupport or send in a ticket to them directly and see if they can help you out. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
